item.title: Top Data Science Interview Questions
item.description: Machine Learning Basics 1. What is machine learning? Machine learning (ML) is a field of computer science that gives computer systems the ability to progressively improve performance on a specific task aka learn with data without being explicitly programmed. Taking a 50,000 ft view, we want to model a given dataset either to make predictions or we want a model to describe a given dataset to gain valuable insights.

item.title: Get Started with Git and Github in Under 10 Minutes
item.description: Git is probably the most popular version control system being used right now, and if you have any experience with other version control systems like subversion than it’s strongly recommended that you go through this section since lot of concepts from other systems don’t directly translate to Git. Git Basics You can create a local Git repository on your computer by either: Clone an existing Git repository from a remote repository on internet (e.
